description: End-to-end integration of all four components: Agent Booster, Model Router, ONNX Embeddings, ReasoningBank

integration_flow.phase_2_analyze: Calculate complexity score and collect embeddings
integration_flow.phase_3_route: Model router checks booster eligibility first, then selects model tier
integration_flow.phase_4_execute: Execute via Agent Booster (WASM) or model tier (API)
integration_flow.phase_5_record: Track trajectory in ReasoningBank with quality score
integration_flow.phase_6_learn: Extract patterns, apply quality gates, share with agents

reliability_characteristics.error_recovery: Retry with degraded model if needed

pattern_retrieval_strategy: Load from JSON files in .agentic-qe/patterns/ on session start
pattern_update_strategy: Append new patterns, maintain version history
memory_coordination_notes: All patterns stored persistently for multi-session learning and agent coordination
